(as of Nov 30,2022 11:04:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

Price: $76.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

EASY TO USE- New “Toolless Quick-Change Head” design allows for easy changing of mandrels and nose pieces by hand
STRONG AND DURABLE – The 16″ rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. With designed structure and tough materiels it is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.
VARIOUS USE-CASE SCENARIOS – It provide professional solution for all kinds of riveting cases as metal plate, plastic piece, riveting workpiece, bicycle attachments, car attachments, decorations etc.
COMPLETE ACCESSORIES & SOLID CARRYING CASE – Equipped with 13pc interchangeable mandrels(Metric M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12; SAE 8-32,10-24,1/4-20,5/16-18,3/8-16,1/2-13) and 200pc rivet nuts (20 rivet nuts each for M3,M4,M5,M6;8-32,10-24, 1/4-20, 10 rivet nuts each for M8,M10,M12; 5/16- 18, 3/8-16,1/2-13.)Please note that the M8 mandrel was installed in the gun,so the small box of M8 is empty.All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability.
WARRANTY AND SERVICE – Incase you are not satisfied with this product for any reason, or you have any question please feel free to contact us, we are ready to service you any time.

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Read more

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

  • The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.
  • The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.
  • Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:34:18 UTC – Details)

From the brand

BurgeonNest Pet Supplies

5 Packs Christmas Puppy Chew Toys will Bring Fun to Your Dog While Improving Dental Health

Heating Pet Pad with Adjustable Timer High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Slow feeder Stainless Steel 4-in-1 Food and Water Bowls with No-Spill Silicone Mat

Super Sturdy Cat Carrier for Large Cats 20 lbs , Medium Cats Under 25 lbs and 2 Cats

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.09 x 4.13 x 3.98 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TK-HPP7040A
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HIRALIY
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08CXM511G

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating
Against-chew Cord and Washable Velvet Cover: This heating pad for cats uses a bite-proof protective sleeve at the junction of the power cord and the steel cord is 2.1 meters which can withstand 5 KG pull.Quick-drying Soft cover can be take out easily and cleaned by hand
Comfortable and Warming: This heated pet mat can be used in pet houses and nests, also suitable for senior pets, arthritic pets, new born pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury. Help the pet (dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) to keep warm and comfortable in cold winter

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

7 Layer Protection Structure

BurgeonNest pet heating pad is made of soft velvet, refractory wool, MET approved heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure & completely sealed, offers pet’s the most comfortable temperature range ( 86-131℉/30-55℃).

High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature, and the dog heated pad will automatically stop working for prevent overheating.

PVC Waterproof Material

Cat bed heater with IP68 Waterproof liner protects from stains and odors etc. It is waterproof material won’t fade, and the material is hardwearing and won’t rip.

Dual Resistant Chew Cord

Cats usually sniff, lick and chew objects to explore everything, this cat warmer pad comes with a steel-wrapped cord to protect dog safety.

Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

The soft velvet cover is removable, so you can machine wash it.

How to Clean: Remove the cover and wash it with hand or washing machine. Do not plug in until the heated pet pad is completely dry.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Purpose-built for reading – With a flush-front design and 300 ppi glare-free display that reads like real paper, even in bright sunlight.
More books in more places – Store thousands of titles, then take them all with you. A single charge via USB-C last weeks, not hours.
Easy on the eyes – Now with adjustable warm light to shift screen shade from white to amber.
Waterproof reading – Built to withstand accidental immersion in water, so you’re good from the beach to the bath.
Find new stories – With Kindle Unlimited, get unlimited access to over 2 million titles, thousands of audiobooks, and more.
Go hands free – Pair with an Audible subscription and Bluetooth headphones or speakers to listen to your story.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Reading done right – Kindle Paperwhite Kids is purpose-built for reading (not a toy), with a black & white 6.8” 300 ppi glare-free display, and up to 10 weeks of battery life.Amazon Kids+ – Enjoy a 1-year subscription to Amazon Kids+, which includes thousands of books and Audible books. After ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $202.97 - $182.97
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:24 UTC – Details)



Reading done right – Kindle Paperwhite Kids is purpose-built for reading (not a toy), with a black & white 6.8” 300 ppi glare-free display, and up to 10 weeks of battery life.
Amazon Kids+ – Enjoy a 1-year subscription to Amazon Kids+, which includes thousands of books and Audible books. After 1 year, your subscription will automatically renew every month starting at just $2.99/month plus applicable tax. You may cancel anytime by visiting the Amazon Parent Dashboard or contacting Customer Service.
No distractions – Kindle Paperwhite Kids is designed for reading—no apps, videos, or games. It also offers OpenDyslexic, a font preferred by some readers with dyslexia.
Waterproof and worry-free – Kids can take their Kindle Paperwhite Kids on the go to read by the pool or the beach. Kindle Paperwhite Kids has been tested to withstand accidental immersion in water. And with a 2-year worry-free guarantee, if it breaks, return it and we’ll replace it for free.
Anytime reading – Adjustable warm light lets kids read indoors and outdoors, day and night.
Tools for readers – Kindle Paperwhite Kids includes Vocabulary Builder and Word Wise to help young readers build their skills.

Price: $202.97 - $182.97
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:24 UTC – Details)
